sql.name: 获取机箱的nfc序列号列表
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_machinebox WHERE 1=1 [ AND instr(nfc_code, upper(':nfcCode')) > 0 ] order by create_date desc

sql.name: 获取处理器的nfc序列号列表
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number,box_nfc_code, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_processor WHERE 1=1 [ AND instr(nfc_code, upper(':nfcCode')) > 0 ] order by create_date desc

sql.name: 获取Moxa的nfc序列号列表
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number,box_nfc_code, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_moxa WHERE 1=1 [ AND instr(nfc_code, upper(':nfcCode')) > 0 ] order by create_date desc

sql.name: 获取探测器的nfc序列号列表
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_detector WHERE 1=1 [ AND instr(nfc_code, upper(':nfcCode')) > 0 ] order by create_date desc, number asc

sql.name: 根据nfc值获取机箱的nfc
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_machinebox WHERE nfc_code = upper(':nfcCode')

sql.name: 根据nfc值获取处理器的nfc
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number,box_nfc_code, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_processor WHERE nfc_code = upper(':nfcCode')

sql.name: 根据nfc值获取Moxa的nfc
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number,box_nfc_code, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_moxa WHERE nfc_code = upper(':nfcCode')

sql.name: 根据nfc值获取探测器的nfc
sql.content: SELECT nfc_code, number, create_date FROM t_nfc_code_detector WHERE nfc_code = upper(':nfcCode')

sql.name: 检查机箱的nfc是否使用
sql.content: SELECT count(*) as countNum FROM t_machine_box WHERE nfc_number = ':nfcCode' [ and id !=':id']

sql.name: 检查处理器的nfc是否使用
sql.content: SELECT count(*) as countNum FROM t_processor WHERE nfc_number = ':nfcCode' [ and id !=':id']

sql.name: 检查Moxa的nfc是否使用
sql.content: SELECT count(*) as countNum FROM t_processor WHERE moxa_number = ':nfcCode' [ and id !=':id']

sql.name: 检查探测器的nfc是否使用
sql.content: SELECT count(*) as countNum FROM t_detector WHERE nfc_number = ':nfcCode' [ and id !=':id']
